name: Fiding Mars
description:
Explore this real and beautiful space while try to find Mars, a really little reddish planet hidden in this infinite star ocean!

Use your mouse to find a tiny reddish-alive point hidden in the image. You have 60 seconds to find as much as you can. Each time you find "Mars" you score and add +2 seconds to your timer.

---

I'm seeking for some feedback in how to get this game better! Please help me if you can ;)

---
